room_title: Escape room "A Nightly Reminder" by Immersion Escape Rooms in Charlottesville
room_address: 2125 Ivy Road Suite F Charlottesville, VA 22903
room_description: For months, Dave has been haunted by a tragic memory. Every time he closes his eyes he is forced to relive devastation and loss. This room, a specially made experience for two people, is a dark and intense exploration into the mind of our main character, and it is up to you to save him from himself. Enter the dream and help Dave recover, because in 30 minutes he will wake to the greatest adventure of his life.
